org.jetel.data

Class DateDataField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataField
      • org.jetel.data.DataFieldImpl
        • org.jetel.data.DateDataField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

    public class DateDataField
extends DataFieldImpl
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    Represents a date data field.
    Since:
    28th March 2002
    See Also:
    DateFormatter, DateFormatterFactory, Serialized Form

      • getValueDuplicate

        public java.util.Date getValueDuplicate()
        Description copied from class: DataField
        Returns the duplicate of the internal value of the data field. If field's value is deemed to be NULL (isNull() return true) then the returned value is NULL. Otherwise the duplicate of the internal value is converted to appropriate object representation and returned.
        Specified by:
        getValueDuplicate in class DataField
        Returns:
        The Value value
        See Also:
        DataField.getValueDuplicate()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from class: DataField
        An operation which sets/resets field to its initial value (just after it was created by JVM) - it varies depending on type of field.
        Nullable fields are set to NULL, non-nullable are zeroed, if they have default value defined, then default value is assigned.
        Specified by:
        reset in class DataField

public char getType()

        April 23, 2002

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Formats the internal date value into a string representation. If metadata describing DateField contains formating string, that string is used to create output. Otherwise the standard format is used.
        Specified by:
        toString in class DataField
        Returns:
        Description of the Returned Value
        Since:
        April 23, 2002
